title: Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent, Cable Ready, #M103
posting_body: Brookstone Apartments are located in the center of SeaTac, Washington, just minutes from the SeaTac International airport, Tukwila Light Rail Station, shopping, restaurants, and schools.
The community is located in a peaceful setting surrounded by large evergreen trees.
Residents enjoy the fantastic amenities, such as a community swimming pool, hot tub, fitness center, valet trash service, and more.
Schedule a tour today and see why residents love calling Brookstone Apartments home!
Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
